name: Flaire & The Mysterious Meadows
description:
Flaire is on a quest to defeat evil for her kingdom! As she leaves the castle walls, she notices something peculiar showing at her first destination; An old watchtower, seemingly full of evil... the perfect first test for your-knightess-in-training!

Here's the basic controls, but there's a tutorial in-game. Please follow it! 

WASD / Spacebar: Move around
X / Left-click: Slash sword
R / Right-click: Defend

1 & 2 / Scrollwheel: Select spells
(1: Clemency- powerful healing spell)
(2: Holy- powerful damage spell; aim with mouse cursor)

E: Cast selected spell

Z: Sheathe / Unsheathe sword

19/01/2019 - Hotfix 1.01:
- Increased Holy damage
- Decreased cast times
- More flexible controls added

Extra credits!
